TopicTitle: Wanderers - Just a must see space short movie (YouTube link provided)

Articles.Content:
This small 4 minute movie, made by artist Erik Wernquist and narrated by Carl Sagan, is probably the most beautiful space short movie i have ever seen... dim the lights, turn the sound up, stream it to the biggest screen you have, lean back, enjoy... replay... replay... awesome.

Visit the creators website here:

http://www.erikwernquist.com/wanderers

Edited December 1, 2014 by Frank_G
Link to creators website added
